OMAS_Docker
  • shared_volume
  • shared_volume package
  • View page source

shared_volume package

Submodules

access_api module

access_api.main()

Python code used by NetLogo to access the API

shared_volume.api module

api.check_new_agentss()

Checks if there is any new agent to insert in the simulation. Return multiple agents (all available at the moment)

api.check_new_agentss_1()

Checks if there is any new agent to insert in the simulation. Return a single agent

api.connect_to_db()

Function used to let the API connect to DB

api.model_to_alive()

At the end of simulation, receives all agents from a model and inserts it into the alive_agent table

api.model_to_alive_single()

At the end of simulation, receives a single agent from a model and inserts it into the alive_agent table

api.output_php()

Function that sends to the PHP code the data to create the list of agents of the simulation

api.page_not_found(e)

Function that handles 404 requests to the API

api.process_agents_on_router()

Function used by the router, that removes an agent from router and inserts it in a simulation, accordingly to the router type

api.register_agents_on_platform()

Route used to register agents on the platform (performed by register)

api.request_to_register()

Route used to register agents on the platform (performed by register)

api.sanity_test()

Sanity test that tests if every agent (at the moment, from 1 to 799): (i) appears in the following situations: - all models table, where processed = 0 - alive agents table, from every model - last one from m3 (current alive agent in JaCaMo) - in router table (router queue) (ii) appears in the previous scenario just once (iii) if every agent from m3 (except for the alive) has a .asl file

api.sanity_test_agent_path_history()

Sanity test: tests the path from a single agent

api.sanity_test_agent_to_jacamo_without_asl_file()

Sanity test: tests if every agent from router, already processed, has a .asl file

api.sanity_test_list()

Sanity test: call all previous sanity test in a single route

api.sanity_test_recheck_agent_path()

Sanity test: for every agent in m1, m2 and m3, tests if the path has a continous cycle

api.serve_sphinx_docs(path='index.html')
api.testing_sending()

Receive an agent, from a model, and inserts it into the router table

shared_volume.api_working module

api_working.check_new_agentss()
api_working.check_new_agentss_1()
api_working.connect_to_db()
api_working.model_to_alive()
api_working.model_to_alive_single()
api_working.output_php()
api_working.page_not_found(e)
api_working.process_agents_on_router()
api_working.register_agents_on_platform()
api_working.request_to_register()
api_working.sanity_test()
api_working.sanity_test_agent_path_history()
api_working.testing_sending()

shared_volume.clean_simulation_files module

clean_simulation_files.main()

Code used to clear simulation files. At this moment, clears output and alive txt files from every NetLogo’s models

shared_volume.netlogo_agent_handler module

netlogo_agent_handler.host_port()

Internal function, to inform host and port to access the API

netlogo_agent_handler.receiving_agents(modelo)

Function used by NetLogo to receive agents from the platform. It receives an agent from the API and inserts it into the simulation. Calls the check_new_agents endpoint on API

netlogo_agent_handler.request_to_register(model, min, max)

Function that requests to register to create a certain amount of agents. Asked by NetLogo. Calls the register_agents_on_platform endpoint on API

netlogo_agent_handler.send_agent_to_alive(agent_id, model)

Function used by NetLogo, when the simulation is over. It removes an agent from the simulation and sends it to the API (to be inserted in alive_agents table). Calls the model_to_alive endpoint on API

netlogo_agent_handler.send_agent_to_router(agent_id, data, path)

Function used by NetLogo, to send agents to the platform. It removes an agent from the simulation and sends it to the API (to be inserted in the router table). Calls the model_to_router endpoint on API

netlogo_agent_handler.testing_exception(error)

Function create for testing only, testing the creation of a custom exception

shared_volume.initialize_db module

initialize_db.main()

Python function to create manually the Databased (not used anymore, the db comes in a .sql file)

shared_volume.python_execute_netlogo module

python_execute_netlogo.execute_model()

Function that executes the NetLogo model

shared_volume.register module

register.request_to_register(model, qtd)

Python code that requests the register to insert a certain amount of new agents in the simulation

shared_volume.router module

router.main()

Loop function that receives and process agents in the router
